lines.text: What kind of a son of a bitch puts a snake in a man's salad?
When a woman has you by the short hairs, you're done, man; finished!
Every night I kneel down and I say my prayers. And every night I ask the good lord 'lord-who are my friends?', and you know something? Every night he don't answer.
To be blind is a half a man; to be blind, with no money, now that's a bitch.
Well Sweet mama, the sun don't shine on the same dogs ass all the time.
